video.title: How Live Coding Changed My Life
video.description:
Jesse Weigel talks about how live coding changed his life.

Recorded at Nodevember 2017.

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Truirrashunovadepressure
topLevelComment.text: I love the content, but this video quality is nearly unwatchable, especially with the buzzing cell phone right next to the camera.

replies.author: Jesse Weigel
replies.text:
Sorry about that. It was live streamed by a generous volunteer with my phone. I wasn't sure if it would even work and figured something was better than nothing. I have since bought a tripod to help and will make sure the vibrations are turned off.

I am really glad you like the content though! Thanks for letting me know!
